sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const TipsOnUsingTagprosForParents = () => { return (

Choosing classes

  • Before enrolling in a class, you can message the teacher using the “Message Teacher” button on the class profile if you have any questions.
  • Always check the required materials section at the bottom of the class profile to see if there are additional costs.

 

Before entering your first class

  • Familiarize yourself with using{' '} Jitsi . You can learn more about the basics of Jitsi{' '} here s.

 

Taking classes

  • Do not be late. The teacher may cancel the meeting if no learners are present after 10 minutes of the start of class and the student will be marked as absent.

 

After classes

  • Learners are not allowed to privately message other learners on our platform.
    • However, parents are allowed to contact each other.
    • Learners and Parents can also contact the teacher.

 

Contacting teachers

  • If your children have any preferred style of teaching, let the teacher know so they can adjust if they are able to.
  • Try to give honest and constructive feedback to the teachers during and after the course to help them improve their teaching style.

 

Working with us

  • Contact{' '} customercare@tagpros.us {' '} if you have any questions or concerns. We are always happy to help.
); }; export default TipsOnUsingTagprosForParents;
